document_data.mainbody:
theruses4|the [[wizard]]s who created unnatural monsters|the alhoon|Beast Lord}}
'''Beast Lords''' were rare individuals who served [[Malar]], knowingly or not, by creating unnatural monsters.
document_data.Culture: Beast Lords were [[wizard]]s who used their arcane powers to breed unnatural monsters such as [[owlbear]]s, [[bulette]]s, and [[peryton]]s. Only a handful of Beast Lords served Malar, and most of those were [[human]]. It was rumored that several [[beholder]] and [[mind flayer]] Beast Lords existed as well.
